tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:name: GLEIF Annual Report Taxonomy
tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:description: This is an extension taxonomy created for reporting Global Legal Entity Identifier Foundation's annual report. The taxonomy imports IFRS 2017 taxonomy, US SEC Reporting Taxonomy and XBRL International's LEI (CR) taxonomy.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: GLIEF Annual Report
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: Elements, presentation tree calculation tree and dimension relationships for preparing Global Legal Entity Identifier Foundation's annual report.
